exempted_outage.description: Is outage exempted under program rules?

outage_cause.description: Cause of outage (e.g. equipment failure, power failure, vandalism).

outage_duration.description: Duration of outage in minutes (including partial minutes)

outage_end.description: Date and time when outage was resolved.

outage_id.description: Unique identifier for an individual outage on an individual port.

outage_start.description: Date and time when outage started or was first detected.

port_id.description:

port_id must be same as the permanent station identifier provided

station_id.description:
Unique identifier for the station where specific port is located.
(For NEVI or other Part 680 project, station_id must be same as
the permanent station identifier provided to third parties pursuant
